title: Workshop on Developing Socio-Scientific Issue Decision-Making Styles for Pre-Service Biology Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology pedagogy and foundational understanding of socio-scientific issues (SSI)
context.additional_context: VR simulation-based replication of real classroom settings to strengthen social science issue-based lesson design and decision-making competencies

learning_goals: Learners can apply an analytical decision-making style in various socio-scientific issues (SSI) contexts.
Learners can propose personalized SSI lesson designs that consider learners' cognitive characteristics (gender, grade level, etc.).
Learners can develop creative SSI lesson scenarios using VR simulation tools and incorporate peer feedback.

resources: SSI (Science-Society Interface) decision-making style analysis tool

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
